directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add soy chorizo and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Add apples and mix well; cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Reduce heat to medium-low. Stir apple mixture and grate imitation cheese on top. Fold in gently as it melts.
ingredients: 12 ounces soy chorizo (such as Trader Joe's®)
2  Fuji apples, chopped into bite-sized pieces
½ (11 ounce) package soy imitation white Mexican soft cheese
title: Daniel Fast Apple Valley Breakfast
